entry.title: Russia Claims Gains in Battle for Bakhmut
entry.content: Russian forces said they had made new advances in their effort to encircle the eastern Ukrainian city, while European leaders arrived in Kyiv to discuss further military aid.

entry.title: How a Radioactive Capsule Was Lost and Found in the Australian Outback
entry.content: Authorities now want to know how the tiny cylinder shook loose from a truck and whether anyone is to blame.

entry.title: Fears of Losing Out to China Put U.S. Under Pressure Over Kenya Base
entry.content: Kenya is asking the U.S. to pay for the expansion of a joint counterterrorism base, raising concerns in Washington that the East African country could turn to China if the Americans balk.Â
